FuncDef: This command triggers a Change of Authorization (CoA) without a RADIUS authentication policy.
CLIs: coa [ nas-port-id <attr-string> ] [ framed-ip-addr <ip-address> ] [ alc-ipv6-addr <ipv6-address> ] [ delegated-ipv6-pfx <ipv6-prefix> [ </ipv6-prefix-length> ] ] [ framed-ipv6-pfx <ipv6-prefix> [ </ipv6-prefix-length> ] ] [ alc-serv-id <serv-id> ] [ acct-session-id <attr-string> ] [ alc-subscr-id <attr-string> ] [ alc-brg-id <attr-string> ] [ alc-client-hw-addr <mac-address> ] [ attr <attribute> [ <attribute> ] ] [ attr-from-file <file-url> ] [ from-server <attr-string> ] [ router-or-service <attr-string> ] [ debug ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the physical access circuit of the NAS up to 253 characters.
Specifies the IPv6 PD host prefix.
Specifies the IPv6 SLAAC host prefix.
Specifies the service ID of the LNS subscriber. Values-0 to 4294967295.
Specifies the subscriber accounting session ID up to 22 characters.
Specifies the subscriber ID up to 32 characters.
Specifies the BRG ID to a maximum of 32 characters.
Specifies the subscriber host MAC address in the form: xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx.

Specifies the attributes (RADIUS VSAs) for override. The VSA must be specified in number format. For example, VSA Alc-Subsc-Prof-Str="1M-prof" is expressed as 6527.12 ="1M-prof". Up to five attributes can be specified within this command.
Specifies the file URL where the VSAs are located.
Specifies the RADIUS server name that is configured under the router or VPRN service context, to a maximum of 32 characters.
Specifies the router or VPRN service instance where the RADIUS server is configured, to a maximum of 32 characters.
Displays the debug message associated with the CoA command.
